title: Simple demonstrations with static electricity
brief_description: Demonstrates basic concepts of static electricity. Shows that friction can produce static electricity, that both positive and negative charges can be created, that identical charges repel and opposite charges attract, and that all matter is electrically charged.
description: Demonstrates basic concepts of static electricity. Shows that friction can produce static electricity, that both positive and negative charges can be created, that identical charges repel and opposite charges attract, and that all matter is electrically charged.
